lines: Have you tried Rosa's mead? It's simply to die for! Well...perhaps not “die” as such, but I would certainly suffer a few stings for a mug. She and those honeybees of hers have a hit on their hands.

It was shortly after the spire sentries developed a taste for the stuff that word began to spread, then before we knew it, customers were turning up from as far afield as Limsa Lominsa! Still, men have traveled further for less!

obj.n: ウェザードサンハット
ワイバーンジャーキン
グリダニアンプライベート・ブレーサー
ワイバーンキュロット
グリダニアンサージェント・モカシン
